idea-plugin.name: Blues Theme
idea-plugin.description: The Blues theme for your IDE immerses you in the atmosphere of old computers and programs, reminiscent of the days of MS DOS. The basis of the color palette is blue, which is complemented by other bright colors. Inspired by the Norton Commander interface, in the Blues theme you will find familiar color combinations that will take you back to the days when programming was still fun and thrilling. Discover new programming horizons and feel like a true old-school hacker while working on your projects.
idea-plugin.change-notes: 1) Change: a matched brace in editor has been made more contrast. 2) Fix: tooltip scrollbar has been made transparent so that it does not hide text. 3) Fix: GotItTooltip button text was invisible. 4) Change: hover color of action buttons to increase contrast. 5) Change: editor active tab color to increase contrast. 6) Fix: arrow on drop down list was invisible.
